Reviews.Title: the perfect phone.... mmm
Reviews.Author: Adrian Moralez
Reviews.Content: This is one good phone, well built... I just loved it. It intdgrates all my fav apps, facebook, mails, zune... All synchronized. The touch responds quick.

Reviews.Title: interesing but 1 big problem
Reviews.Author: mark h
Reviews.Content: Microsoft has changed their operating system completely in this new version of windows phone 7. It is an interesting approach trying to connect and simplify administraction of phone, social media, etc, but they have not included a very important feature: usb sync for outlook. You just can't do it, even if you uprgade to windowws phone 7.5 (mango). For me this is a big problem as I do not want to have all my private info in the cloud and get a new email address to being able to sync my data. Big mistake of windows and incredible that they missed this one. It is a big productivity loss in my opinion. It has always been an important feature and reason why I chose windows phones before. I am currebntly not using the new phone, because of this mishap...

Reviews.Title: HTC MOZART5
Reviews.Author: Leonimel
Reviews.Content: Like this HTC. Plenty of apps to enjoy.  the only drawback is the battery.  Other than that the cellphone is worthy.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good!!
Reviews.Author: shaanboy
Reviews.Content: I bought this from Amazon a month ago and got it in 2 days!!And that was with normal shipping!The phone itself is wonderful though the camera could have been better.It has a beautiful interface and is also very fast.The negative aspects are the lack of quality apps and the difficulty in using a custom ringtone.Battery life is average but overall for this price,the phone is definitely worth it!!

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Dalibor
Reviews.Content: this product fullfilled all expectations and more than i expect. i'm very satisfy and i recomend it for other buyers.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for me!! Very happy!
Reviews.Author: eeras96
Reviews.Content: This cell phone have all that I want for my first cell phone, it's fast and work great, only maybe is the camera that is not so good for 8 mega pixels and don't have a port for micro sd card. I'm happy with the cell phone and recommend it!!!

Reviews.Title: It oka
Reviews.Author: Terry Kwesi Baiden
Reviews.Content: I had great expectation when buying the phone since I have never used windows phone before but I was very disappointed when it came.

Reviews.Title: HTC mozart T8698
Reviews.Author: Rafael
Reviews.Content: I will write a little and i can say i like this phone. It is the best telephone around this price.

Reviews.Title: Love the features, hate the battery performance
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: I love the phone, its definition, its camera and everything on it... except for the battery. On a good day it last 18 hours. My son saw 42 minutes of video on it, and totally killed the battery. That sucks. I come from a Nokia background and love the battery performance on them, so I was pretty upset when HTC only provide merely hours.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Shen
Reviews.Content: This product was great, I love it and it was a great description, working well so me so far, I might buy another!

Reviews.Title: problems to receive phone
Reviews.Author: giovanny
Reviews.Content: hi, i buy this phone but it's en miami cuz they told me u not send the invoice so i can receive it in Santo domingo, so send me the invoice in givaca91@gmail.com or send it to my address in miami thx

Reviews.Title: great phone.
Reviews.Author: ulka
Reviews.Content: this phone is just wonderful. it is beautiful, useful. i bought it for my boyfriend and he is very happy:)
